title: Video: We Cut Corners – Toll Free
content:
When I traveled over to Dublin in September last year for the fantastic Hard Working Class Heroes Festival, one act in particular blew me away.

With their unparalleled diversity and stunning vocal sections, We Cut Corners undoubtedly stole the show, and ensured that I’ve kept an eye on them ever since. Having released their debut album Today I Realised I Could Go Home Backwards a few months back, they’ve steadily been building up a loyal following, both in Ireland and over in the UK. New single Toll Free is a joyous slice of Foals meets The Maccabees indie-pop, accompanied by an utterly bizarre yet quirky video directed by TUSK.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
